person.name: Shamino
person.topic: I seek the inner light.
I am well.
I seek the "one great truth"!
That which lies within the codex!

person.name: Emerson
person.topic: I seek the spiritual path.
I am grievously wounded.
Spiritual is stronger than any material force.
Nothing can bring thee peace but the triumph of principles!Art thou good in spirit?A good path.An evil path!

person.name: Santayana
person.topic: I carry the light within my heart.
I am alive.
The light of philosophy.
In philosophical minds the familiar excites wonder!Dost thou always tread the right path?Doubtful!Few can, but strive to do so!

person.name: Presto
person.topic: I cast great big spells!
Superior!
I can cast: jinx, kill, and view!Dost thou know what these spells have in common?What?Guess!
Yes, ask the barkeep at 'The Axe-n-Ale' in Vesper about nightshade.

person.name: Granted
person.topic: I beg for food and money.
I am not at all well.
To eat!
To buy food!Wilt thou give me food or money?In return I will tell thee that the ankh knows of the rune and my friend Ambule knows the mantra!Jerk!

person.name: Mitre
person.topic: I am reading the wizard's journal.
I am fine.
It tells of the white stone.
It is no longer in the dungeon Hythloth, it is gone!Wilt thou try to recover it?Ask of the stone at the Tap in Trinsic!Too bad.

person.name: Buddha
person.topic: I teach.
I am well.
When one has pity on all living creatures then is one noble.
If one speaks or acts with pure thought, happiness will follow like a shadow that never leaves.

person.name: Michaelangelo
person.topic: I strive along the path.Art thou far along the path?This is good.Fear not thou shalt be.
Well.
Success is a journey, not a destination.
May thou always desire more than thou can accomplish!

person.name: Romasco
person.description: A short dumpy man with a book.
person.topic: I am a teacher, I enrich young minds.
I am fine.
I teach of the abyss.Know ye of the abyss?A word of passage is needed at the last gate!Learn!
Seek Zair the Wise in Paws for more on the word.

person.name: Carlyle
person.topic: I write magic.Dost thou believe in magic?Magic missiles need but 1 part ash!I see.
Fine.
One lives by believing in something.
Great discoveries are made by those whose feelings run ahead of their thinking.

person.name: Dickens
person.topic: I write stories.
O.K.
Stories are good for the spirit!
Remember, no one is useless in this world who lightens the burdens of others!Art thou good in nature?Be sure thy net good well exceeds thy net evil!I see.

person.name: White
person.topic: I quest.
Excellent!
Many quests are very dangerous!Art thou fearless in all thing?Boastful fool!Danger is real!
I am not afraid of tomorrow; I have seen yesterday and I love today.

person.name: the Ankh of Spirituality
person.topic: I keep the secret of the rune.
Strong.
Mantra?
Search for the rune of spirituality in the treasure chamber of Britannia!Hast thou found the shrine?Good!Enter the gate of full moons!

person.name: Ambule
person.topic: I beg for but for a single gold piece!
So-so.
Oh, please... Oh, please...Wilt thou please give me a gold piece?Dear kind soul.Stingy, I know thou hast many!
Ask the child named Barren.

person.name: Barren
person.topic: No job.
O.K.
I know it well, it is 'OM'.
A

person.name: Isaac
person.topic: I haunt this inn!
I am many years dead.
The quest is not complete!Art thou on the quest?Hope!Alas.
The white stone sits atop the Serpent's Spine. It can only be reached by one who floats within the clouds.
